alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Knox; NW Blount; North Sevier; Northwest Cocke; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 2:26PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Knox, northeastern Blount, Jefferson and Sevier Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 325 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sevierville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sevierville, Jefferson City, Newport, Gatlinburg, Dandridge, Pigeon Forge, White Pine, New Market, Baneberry and Strawberry Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson; Knox; NW Blount; North Sevier; Northwest Cocke; Sevier Smoky Mountains
